price: Kuma imma dai, haƙĩƙa, Mu nũna maka sãshen abin da Muke yi musu alkawari, kõ kuwa Mu karɓi ranka, to, zuwa gare Mu makõmarsu take. Sa'an nan kuma Allah ne shaida a kan abin da suke aikatãwa.
arabic: وَإِمَّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي نَعِدُهُمۡ أَوۡ نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-immā nuriyannaka baʿḍa alladhī naʿiduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilaynā marjiʿuhum thumma al-lahu shahīdun ʿalā mā yafʿalūna
